mapper.select: SELECT * FROM properties ORDER BY name

SELECT * FROM properties WHERE (#{area} IS NULL OR area = #{area}) AND (#{keyword} IS NULL OR LOWER(name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) OR LOWER(address) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))) ORDER BY name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO properties (name, address, area, plan) VALUES (#{name}, #{address}, #{area}, #{plan})
mapper.update: UPDATE properties SET name = #{name}, address = #{address}, area = #{area}, plan = #{plan}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
